item.description: Quick note how to upgrade a postgresql from version 9.3 to 9.

item.title: MySQL to Postgresql
item.description: I dislike MySQL. I never did like it, since Oracle bought Sun it starting to become more then just disliking it. I prefer to work with Postgresql. I want to migrate some of my MySQL DB to Postgresql.

item.title: Enable remote access for PostgreSQL
item.description: Remote access to a Postgtres Database In the last days i have worked a lot with PostgreSQL.

item.title: Debian PostgreSQL 8.4 can't create Database with UTF-8 Encoding
item.description: The Problem I encounter a problem with fresh Debian VM. I create this VM for our developer, during the installation script following problem appears and stop the script: new encoding (UTF8) is incompatible with the encoding of the template database (SQL_ASCII) HINT: Use the same encoding as in the template database, or use template0 as template.
